```{r}
library(clusterProfiler)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv("/Users/creixell/Desktop/UCLA/Projects/MRSA_GO_analysis/MRSA_GO_Input.csv")
data <- data[, c(1, 2)]
xx <- compareCluster(Gene~Components, data=data, fun='enrichGO', keyType="ENSEMBL", ont="BP",  OrgDb='org.Hs.eg.db', pAdjustMethod='hochberg')
xxSimp <- simplify(xx, cutoff=0.7, by="p.adjust", select_fun=min)
```

```{r}
ggplot(xxSimp, aes(x=Components, y=Description, colour=p.adjust)) + geom_point(aes(size=GeneRatio)) + theme_bw() + ggtitle("Cellular Compartment") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```

```{r}
ggsave("/Users/creixell/Desktop/MRSA_GO_CC.png", units='cm', width=20, height=15)
```
